title: My LoL launcher wont open
body:
My LoL wont launch even if i run administrator it just shows me logo and not open
Help

replies.body:
Two main things can prevent the client from even launching: permissions and connection problems. Since you've already addressed the permissions side, I recommend taking a look at our [connection knowledge base article](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), which goes over the most common solutions for connection issues.

Let me know if you notice any change.
I don't think those are problems
